section: However, Company guarantees completion within 8 weeks, with penalties for delays beyond this timeframe as specified elsewhere in this Agreement.
explanation: This statement guarantees completion within 8 weeks, but the agreement lacks specific details regarding the penalties for delays beyond this timeframe. The phrase "as specified elsewhere in this Agreement" implies that penalties are outlined, however, no such penalties are mentioned anywhere else. This is an in-text contradiction because the text refers to penalties that don't exist within the agreement.

section: Terms of the project: 12 weeks from February 8, 2018 to May 3, 2018. However, Company guarantees completion within 8 weeks, with penalties for delays beyond this timeframe as specified elsewhere in this Agreement.
explanation: The contract states two different time frames for the completion of the project. The project terms outline a 12 week completion time, however, the document guarantees project completion within 8 weeks. This creates an ambiguity and it is unclear whether the company has 8 weeks or 12 weeks to complete the project.

section: The surcharge for rush work shall be either the standard hourly rate of $40 plus twenty-five percent (25%) or a flat fee of $100 per hour, whichever is lower.
explanation: The wording of the text is flawed. $40 plus twenty-five percent (25%) is $50. The text states "whichever is lower" but $50 is lower than $100, thus always making the standard hourly rate plus 25% lower.
